feature.name: Cobble
feature.image: • No cobble in the stream • No vegetation on cobble (least stable) • No cobble partially submerged in the water (no colonization spots for fish/insects)
• Few cobble in the stream • Little vegetation on cobble • Few cobble partially submerged in the water
• Some cobble in the stream • Some vegetation/moss on cobble • More cobble partially submerged in the water
• More cobble in the stream • More vegetation/moss on cobble • Many cobble partially submerged in the water
• Many cobble in the stream • Most vegetation/moss on cobble • Most cobble partially submerged in the water ( many colonization spots for insects and fish)

feature.name: SnagsLogs
feature.image: • No logs or snags/branches in the stream • No vegetation/moss on logs/snags • No logs/snags partially submerged in the water (no colonization spots for fish/insects)
• Few logs or snags/branches in or near the water • Little vegetation/moss on logs/snags • Few logs/snags partially submerged in the water
• Some logs or snags/branches in the stream • Some vegetation/moss on logs/snags • Some logs/snags partially submerged in the water
• Many logs and snags/branches in the stream • More vegetation/moss on logs/snags • More logs/snags partially submerged in the water
• Most logs on snags/branches in stream • Most vegetation/moss on logs/snags • Many logs/snags partially submerged in the water (many colonization spots for insects and fish)

feature.name: UndercutBanks
feature.image: • No snags /branches covering undercut • Undercut not in the water (no colonization spots for fish/insects) • No undercut in bank for fish and bugs to hide
• Few snags /branches covering undercut • Small part of undercut not in the water • Small undercut in bank for fish and bugs to hide
• Some snags /branches covering undercutSome of undercut in the water • Some undercut in bank for fish and bugs to hide
• Many snags /branches covering undercut • More of undercut in the water • Bigger undercut in bank for fish and bugs to hide
• Most snags /branches covering undercut • Most of undercut in the water ( many colonization spots for insects and fish) • Biggest undercut in bank for fish and bugs to hide

feature.name: UnderwaterVegetation
feature.image: • No vegetation in or on the sides of the stream
• Little vegetation in or on the sides of the stream
• Some vegetation in or on the sides of the stream
• More vegetation in or on the sides of the stream
• A lot of vegetation in or on the sides of the stream

feature.name: BankFailure
feature.image: • Much of the bank has crumbled or fallen into the stream
• Some of the bank has crumbled or fallen into the stream
• A small part of bank has crumbled or fallen into the stream
• None of the bank has crumbled or fallen into the stream

feature.name: BankSlope
feature.image: • Very steep bank slope
• Somewhat steep bank slope
• Moderate bank slope
• Gentle or gradual bank slope

feature.name: BankVegetation
feature.image: • No vegetation on bank
• Little vegetation on bank. Vegetation primarily composed of grass, with some "raw" areas
• More vegetation on bank. Vegetation composed of some grass and few plants
• Vegetation densly covers bank. Vegetation composed of trees, plants, grass.

feature.name: ErodedAreas
feature.image: • Very uneven bank slope (Many cuts/grooves ) • Very steep bank slope
• Somewhat uneven bank slope (Some cuts/groooves) • Somewhat steep bank slope
• Moderately uneven bank slope (few cuts/grooves) • Moderate bank slope
• Most even bank slope (no cuts grooves) • Gentle or gradual bank slope

feature.name: ExposedTreeRoots
feature.image: • Most exposed tree roots
• Many exposed tree roots
• Few exposed tree roots
• No exposed tree roots
